description: Binomial coefficients formed from consecutive primes: a(n) = binomial( prime(n+1), prime(n) ).
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: P:=proc(n) local i,w; for i from 1 by 1 to n do w:=binomial(ithprime(i+1),ithprime(i)); print(w); od; end: P(1000); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 24 2007
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 13 2000
